typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{sepal lengh} as float,
		{sepal width} as float,
		{some other name } as float,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	preferredIntegralType: 'short',
	preferredFractionalType: 'float') ~> Iris
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
Iris split(toFloat({sepal lengh}) > 5.5,
	disjoint: false) ~> isSepalLengthGt55@(isSepalLengthGt55, isSepalLengthLe55)
source1, source2 join(source1@Column_1 == source2@Column_1
	&& source1@Column_2 == source2@Column_2
	&& source1@Column_3 == source2@Column_3,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
isSepalLengthGt55@isSepalLengthGt55 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sepalsWithLengthGt55
isSepalLengthGt55@isSepalLengthLe55 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sepalsWithLengthLe55
Join1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		Column_1 = source1@Column_1,
		Column_2 = source1@Column_2,
		Column_3 = source1@Column_3,
		Column_4 = source1@Column_4,
		Column_5 = source1@Column_5,
		Column_1 = source2@Column_1,
		Column_2 = source2@Column_2,
		Column_3 = source2@Column_3,
		Column_4 = source2@Column_4,
		Column_5 = source2@Column_5
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
